## ExtensionManager.getPluginState() method

Retrieve the state for a given extension name. This will throw an error if the extension doesn't exist.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getPluginState<GState>(name: this['_N']): GState;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  name | <code>this['_N']</code> | the name of the extension |

<b>Returns:</b>

`GState`
